title: Drawing, 20th century
medium: Brush and black ink, white and blue gouache on paper
description: Bottle with stepped and rounded foot, convex body with cartouche framed by garlands, short neck with curved finial topped with bead and decorated with garlands.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 20th century.
20th century. Brush and black ink, white and blue gouache on paper. Gift of Monique Fink. 1990-149-10.
